bill.title: Relating to a farmworker pesticide outreach program; prescribing an effective date.
bill.description: Directs State Department of Agriculture, in consultation with Pesticide Analytical and Response Center, to establish farmworker outreach program. Directs State Department of Agriculture, in consultation with Pesticide Analytical and Response Center, to establish farmworker outreach program. Appropriates moneys to department to implement program. Takes effect on 91st day following adjournment sine die.
